website_summaries.verdict: The Ecentrcq from the Steve Madden casual shoe collection has been much admired for its stylish, cute, and versatile look. It has a casual charm that makes it suitable for many activities, especially in the summer or fall. Some users have bought multiple pairs because they find the model so pleasing.Additionally, the shoe has been found to be comfortable. However, several wearers note that the sneaker runs narrow. It has also been found to have a painful break-in period.
pros: The Steve Madden Ecentrcq is very comfortable and can be worn all day long, many wearers have revealed
It’s a stylish and cute pair of kicks, most commenters have admired
Most reviewers will recommend the model
This shoe goes with everything, a lot of buyers praise
Several purchasers have bought the Steve Madden Ecentrcq in different colors
The Steve Madden Ecentrcq is budget-friendly, with a lot of reviewers saying that the shoe’s value at its price is satisfying
Quite a few users have shared that they wear this model from the Steve Madden sneaker series all the time
Several buyers commend the shoe as it can easily be slipped on and off, especially when one is on the go
Some purchasers impart that they have received many compliments for the Steve Madden Ecentrcq
It's perfect for the summer or fall season, some wearers have attested
cons: Several commenters added that the shoe runs rather narrow
The Steve Madden Ecentrcq is very rigid and hard to break in, which results in blisters, some users have complained

customer_reviews.title: I feel like these are a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Don't order these unless you want blisters & sore feet. I feel like these are a knock off, tried them in the store & they felt amazing, the ones I got online don't feel the same. Also the sole of the shoe is not white like in the picture, it's like a weird cream & looks dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Ciprian Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a cheaper price then all the department stores, even the big DS* warehouse. They are the real Steven madden, same as in the store only I saved an extra $15! Stick with your standard size. The pink rose is very pretty and a fun mix with green and plum colors for fall.
customer_reviews.author: JR. Heat

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, as pictured! Size up a half size.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes came out really cute! I was worried when I saw the reviews that looked like completely different shoes, but these look just like the picture! I usually wear a size 8.5, but those came in and felt a little too snug. I thought it would rub and cause blisters after a long period of time. I sized up to a 9 and they fit perfectly! I wear them with thin, no show socks and it's perfect. I think they would fit just as well too without the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and fits great. Exactly what I expected thank you
customer_reviews.author: Yaela

customer_reviews.title: Too Small, Probably Not Steve Madden
customer_reviews.text: #1 These shoes are way too small. Like a whole size too small. #2 These shoes are probably not Steve Madden. There were some Steve Madden insoles shoved into both shoes, with the toe part all curled up inside. Even after flattening it out, the shoes are so tight. Returning these because I feel cheated. They do look just like the photo, for what it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: 8.5M are painfully narrow & 8.5W are Gigantic!
customer_reviews.text: This 8.5W is GIGANTIC! I have the exact shoe in 8.5M & it is painfully tight so I ordered 8.5W & they are much longer & wider as if they are a Men’s size. This is so disappointing because the shoe is super cute. I recommend trying on in a store or purchasing multiple sizes. The photo I included shows 8.5W on the left.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Voss

customer_reviews.title: Too Big, No prepaid return shipping, Not like whats in store
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on in the store prior to ordering which is how i fell in love with them. They did not have my color so i resulted to amazon like I always do. I was going on vacation and wanted to wear them. I received these in a 10 in women and they fit like 10 in men... entirely too big. I went to return them and shipping was not prepaid... I spent $21 on these and the shipping came to about $25. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Two different shoes??
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I purchased these Steve Madden shoes. I couldn’t wait for them to come in! I tried both of them on and was disappointed that the right shoe fit. It was the same pair from the images shown on this page. I bought a size 5 and both shoes are are a size 5. The right pair fits perfect but the left pair doesn’t fit. But is a size 5. The pair of shoes are completely different in style and size..
customer_reviews.author: Philena Pham

customer_reviews.title: Feet can’t breath.
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing after ~3mo of purchase. Uncomfortable because of the excessive sweating. Feet can’t breathe in these shoes. I hardly ever get a lil drop of sweat even after running 4 miles so I know it is not me. If you don’t mind taking feet out of shoes in your meetings or at your desk, these shoes would work. Shiny round brand button fell off from right shoe after 3rd day of wearing it. Target has same style for $20.
customer_reviews.author: HEIDY

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe is a Frog!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is horrible!! The heel bed is so stiff is rubs holes in the back of your ankle, trying to tear your flesh from bone!! There is no support (not that I expected there to be any) but a hard rubber foot bed with no flexibility? Why not use cement? I should have tried them on before the 30 days were up to get my money back because these shoes were made by the devil....or by every ex boyfriend I’ve ever had. Whoever made this shoe hates women...I’m sure of it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes after returning a different pair because they were too small. I can not stress enough that with these sneakers (in any color... I own multiple) you have to order a half size up. Other than that these are very comfortable. The color is more of an off white, but very close. The quilt pattern is really cute and dresses them up a little bit. They are a synthetic leather and not a cloth material. My feet are narrow and there is plenty of room width wise. I managed to walk all day through an art fair on my first day of owning them without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I received these straight from Amazon using their Prime Wardrobe service. They were an entire size too small. I managed to cram my foot in but couldn't even take 1 step. The quality seemed nice, but now reading the reviews, I think they were fake due to the box. The box was cheaply printed. The quality of the box's corrugation and thickness weren't suspicious, but the logo printed on top was cheapy. I am a true size 10 and received a 10, but it was definitely a 9.
customer_reviews.author: eXample

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super cute, but so so painful
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute, but so so painful. I tried "breaking them in" and was left with blisters all over my heels. I tried ordering padding to stick on the back of the shoe to alleviate the pain, but this didn't help. I wouldn't recommend these shoes. I'm sad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindymac

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments all the time! I usually wear a 7 but my feet are wider so 7.5 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: I have thoroughly enjoyed these since I bought them and I have gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small so get at least a half to one whole size up from your normal shoe size. I got a half size up and I still have one toe that occasionally feels cramped in the shoe. It has never been a problem though that has bothered me when walking or wearing the shoes. I have thoroughly enjoyed these since I bought them and I have gotten multiple compliments on them. They are well priced and trendy. I really like the grey color in particular because it can be worn with so many different colors and styles. Highly recommend with the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I saw this really cute outfit on Pinterest and I really wanted to recreate it. One of the items were these pair of shoes. I hesitated for a bit because of the other reviews. It took me 5 months until I actually checked it out and I absolutely love it! It feels snug on the foot. I'm a bit wide but I got the regular anyway. Very cute style and it's very comfortable. I was really tired of wearing skater shoes to work and I think this alternative makes it a tad bit classier while still maintaining coolness.
customer_reviews.author: TheFoxSays

customer_reviews.title: ... they rubbed in the toe box of one shoe- glad I missed the return window because they are my ...
customer_reviews.text: Note- almost always a size 10 but went with recommendations and glad I did! Even then, I was originally going to return these shoes because they rubbed in the toe box of one shoe- glad I missed the return window because they are my go to work/rain sneaker. They have stretched out a tiny bit but that was the perfect amount for me. I do with they had better arch support but that was easily remedies with an insert. Overall a cute look and waterproof too!
customer_reviews.author: Nav T

customer_reviews.title: Got home and was like I need those shoes in my life
customer_reviews.text: There is no way these are real. I tried them on in store and didn't think I would ever wear them. Got home and was like I need those shoes in my life! ordered the exact same size i tried on previously and they arent even close. literally can't even get them on.... and why do they come in an unmarked box?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish But Small
customer_reviews.text: This shoes look super great, but they take some breaking in. I'm glad I ordered a 7.5 (I'm usually a true 7), based on other reviews I decided to go half a size up since the consensus was that they're pretty narrow and can run smaller than most shoes. I thought about exchanging them for an 8 but I'm too afraid that they will be just big enough that it'll be blister city. So I've worn these around with thick socks for a few days and that has helped quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Waaay too small...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are gorgeous and I wish I could wear them but they are way too small. My foot size ranges from 8.5- 9, so I ordered a size 9.5 cause of the reviews and they are still waaay too small. I will re-order them but I am very sad about it because I will have to wait a lot longer. 😩 Also, these are taupe not grey, still, a versatile color and very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: lunamiel

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first pair in a shoe store and love them so much, I purchased my next pair here on amazon. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because they do not run true to size. ORDER 1/2 SIZE BIGGER I wear an 8 and I need and 8.5 in these shoes. Also, they are very stiff in the beginning. I do not recommend trying to break these in at an all day event. Definitely break them in at home
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C

customer_reviews.title: Super small and plastic-y sock liner :(
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes, but TINY. I wear and 8.5/9 and the 9.5 was way too small (I could barely get my foot in!). Also... the sock liner of this show is a horrible plastic-y material that (I imagine) would make it both hot and uncomfortable to wear. I guess that was probably in the fine print, so maybe I shouldn't dock stars for that... but it's still an indication of low quality to me. I didn't bother to re-order in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Hones

customer_reviews.title: 5 and fit like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8.5 (39) shoe size. My sister warned me to order up a size because these shoes run small. Therefore, I ordered a size 9 and the shoe is still small as my toes are crammed in the front of the shoe. The back of the shoe uncomfortably rubbed my heel as I walked leaving my heal raw. I cannot return the shoe because I did wear them for a day. I have a pair of Toms Avalon shoes that are similar and they are my true size 8.5 and fit like a dream. Skip the Steves and go with Toms.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mat

customer_reviews.title: Order from official site!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7.5 it was tight. I didn't even return it. I just donated them and bought an 8. HALF SIZE UP -- they're huge and uneven and just don't feel authentic at all - this and seeing the other reviews - leads me to believe these are fake. Now I lost $120$ and still don't have the product I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Reviews

customer_reviews.title: MADE ME BLEED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made me bleed!! I thought these shoes were so cute! I bought 2 pairs! One in black, one in grey. I wore them for the first time and thought they felt small but kept wearing them to “break “ them in... I have never experienced such an uncomfortable shoe! Not only did I get blisters on my heels, but they made my heels bleed!! I’m sooo upset I bought 2 pairs. I expected higher quality from a Steve Madden brand. I wore them to the mall and had to leave bc I was almost crying in pain... I even ordered a size up.... BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Mercurio

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off Steve Madden
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a women’s 9.5 shoe. I couldn’t even get my foot into it. It’s smaller than my son’s shoe. Should have known that the price was too good to be true to expect a real Steve Madden shoe. I’ve showed a women’s 9.5 Skecher beside it for comparison of how little it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zelmer

customer_reviews.title: Fake!  Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are not legit Steve Madden shoes. I ordered a 9.5 and they were way too tight-those may have been legit because they had a lot of support and came in a regular box. I had to return them and got a size 10. They came in a bag and looked cheaply made and fit completely different. Don’t buy these! They are too expensive for a cheap knockoff. I am returning the size 10 and just ordered straight from the Steven Madden website-which I should have done in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Heel pain
customer_reviews.text: The top of the heel part rubbed too much so I needed to return them. I don’t usually buy wide but the reviews said they ran narrow and small. So I ordered wide and half Size bigger than normal. I was swimming in them.i ordered my size and they fit a little better but still a tad big, however the heel still rubbed so I ended up with some dr scholls they are similar and have a padded heel.
customer_reviews.author: kttiekat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing leopard slip ons and look really comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Was really unsure how these were going to look because of some of the reviews but I have to say I am pleasantly surprised! They look super cute and I am definitely keeping them! My favorite pair I’ve seen online and so happy they look like the picture 🙌
customer_reviews.author: qrpike

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, true to size, and super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these casual leopard sneakers from Steve Madden. They are absolutely adorable and very comfortable. They are so versatile and pair great with leggings, skinny jeans, or a casual dress. For reference; I wear a size 7 in most shoes and the 7 in these for me was perfect. I have a pretty average foot, not wide but not narrow either. Don’t hesitate, buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic0418

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size, dirty soles
customer_reviews.text: The shoe style is exactly what is advertised, looks great, I have a pink pair just like the ones I bought. Bought a size 8, the same size as my other pair. Way too small and they were worn already! Why did I get a pair of shoes that have been obviously worn around, even if they were floor model shoes? When I buy a pair of shoes I want a pair that no one else has worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Another one of my hidden gems I found on amazon warehouse. For the price I paid I cant complain too much. However I usually fit in a size 8, these however are bit tight that they gave me a blister on my heals. I will be giving them to my best friend see if they fit her better.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Too tight. SIZE UP-halfsize to a full size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit too small for my feet. I got the 8.5 when I should have gone up to a 9-9.5 almost. Typically I range from 8.5-9.5 in shoes. Thinking that I might just give these to my older sister instead as she is a smaller shoe size than me.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I thought these were adorable and I was very excited to receive them
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were adorable and I was very excited to receive them. The material seemed high quality, unfortunately the fit seemed off. They were very tight in the front and on the sides. (I have narrow feet) But they were very loose in the back. I was bummed, but the return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Red XIII

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a 1/2 size larger than I normally wear due to other reviews. Great decision. I normally wear a 7 1/2 and bought an 8 and they fit perfectly! The width is a tad wide but not to where I would send them back. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size, they're not too snug and there's not too much wiggle room. It just enough to work with so I can see how the sizing may be a bit inconsistent. It takes a couple days to break them in. They may not be the best shoes if you're on your feet all day because they are stiff.They are not constructed with much flexibility or arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Christina L

customer_reviews.title: Cute BUT Crunched...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe but way too small. I normally wear a 9.5, so I sized up to a 10 based on other reviews. The 10 did not fit comfortably. My toes were very cramped. I would return for a larger size but I will continue looking for a similar shoe in another brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: GiveMeQuality

customer_reviews.title: wide fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a medium width but they are more like a wide width, they rubbed blisters on the side of my heels. I have several pair of Steve Madden shoes in the exact same size that fit well, these were ill-fitting. But they look great! The animal print is vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Lacortezcoastal

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers, they are very cute and pretty comfortable. I order a half size up due to reviews but found the sneaker was slightly loose, may fit more snug with no show socks. I wear a size 6 and have fairly small feet so that might be fine they fit a tad looser than what I was expecting from reading other reviews. I plan on wearing them to site see around Europe so I'll update the review to see how they last with lots of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as expected...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the shoe. I had to order 3 different times before getting the right fit. My daughter wears a 9. The 9 that was sent fit more like an eight. Sent the 9 back for a 9 1/2 and it was still too small and too narrow. Then sent that one back for a 9 1/2 wide. It fit but the first time she wore them it cut her heal because of a piece of the leather not being cut and smoothed out on the inside. Very bummed with the fit and comfort. Order at least a size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP!
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to break these shoes in aggressively. They’re super stiff and if you have wider feet, it’s really rough in the beginning. I ordered a half size up and I wish I went up a whole size. However, these shoes are super cute for any occasion, whether more causal or business. They are worth breaking in. I went all in; got them wet, hair dried them with thick socks, and straight up bent them around. Now I can be on my feet in them for much longer! I still wouldn’t call them comfy, but I don’t dread wearing them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Skafidas

customer_reviews.title: Love it, runs small
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Pretty comfy but they are kind of stiff but not enough for blisters. I normally wear a 7.5 but tried these on before buying on here. I ordered an 8 because the 7.5 was way too snug and since the material is stiff it actually hurt my toe to wear the 7.5. the 8 is a tad loose so I'm hoping they don't stretch out at all
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Run way too small, but super comfortable when you get the right shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, once you fine the right size. I normally wear anywhere from a 7.5-8.5 in shoes. I had to buy these twice to figure out I wear a 9.5. My daughter who is normally an 8.5-9 is women’s shoes is wearing an 11. Way off Steve! Once you figure out that you need to size up at least a whole number, they are comfortable. Easy slip on and off and super comfortable! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Talisa

customer_reviews.title: rubbed on back of heels
customer_reviews.text: I wore these three times to work and now I am going to take them to the Goodwill. They rubbed a large sore on my Achilles tendon. I tried a band aid and it did not help. I loved the color.There should be a softer fabric in the back of the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: karen johnston

customer_reviews.title: Know Your Shoe Before You Order
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked great in person, though the sole appeared thicker than in the photo. It was so narrow that I could only get my left foot all the way in. You may want to visit a shoe department to learn your “Steve Madden” best fit before you order these.
customer_reviews.author: SandyW.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small - save your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a size 10 and the 10s wouldn't even remotely fit on my feet. I returned them and bought a size 11 instead. The 11s were still so tight and uncomfortable if I wore them out for a day my feet would be covered in blisters. I'll be returning the 11s too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: NOT AUTHENTIC
customer_reviews.text: COMPLETE KNOCK OFFS! I’ve always been a 8.5 in Steve Madden with no issues whatsoever and when I bought these my whole foot wouldn’t even go inside the shoe without a fight!THEY SMELL LIKE COMPLETE PLASTIC! RIDICULOUS! DO NOT BUY! FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.author: Nadine c Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Material is great and I was warned before hand by a friend ...
customer_reviews.text: Material is great and I was warned before hand by a friend who bought her pair that they run a little small so I bought a size 8 (I'm normally a size 7.5) and they fit nicely but if I would have bought a size 7.5 they would have been uncomfortable. So buy at least 1/2 a size up. Otherwise they are comfortable and definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought the used ones, but they still look like new, and the price is the most convenient. $ bucks for shoes, and that too Steve Madden. I could not be much happier. If they are cheap knock-offs, also I won't mind. Not that they are. They came in a genuine box, and Amazon quality approved seal.
customer_reviews.author: Diya

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely gorgeous in person. But the fit nearly a whole size smaller that sized. I typically wear a 9.5 to 10. Ordered the size 10 and they were soooo small I couldn’t even get my foot in the shoe the whole way. Really wanted these to be a winner because I need them for a business trip but they definitely do not fit true to size at all! You’ll need to size up a full size.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Wide vs. Regular
customer_reviews.text: I had these same shoes previously in a size 8.5, I usually wear an 8. I got them in 8.5 wide and they were too big. I reordered an 8 wide and fit perfectly. IF you are ordering the regular (not wide) get a half size up in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Weird fit in general. I ordered wide since the reviews said they are super narrow, still didn't fit right. The wide is huge with a small opening and not true to size as far as length goes they were short. The box was also damaged. Just odd in general, never had shoes fit like this before.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute. The picture doesn't match the shoes I ordered so that made things confusing but what I got is what I wanted. I am a true 8.5 but these are very tight. I want to exchange them for a size 9 but the price has since increased since I purchased these and I don't want to spend that kind of money on the shoe. I'm stuck with a pair of shoes I can't wear comfortably now. I shouldn't have ignored the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Erica_Roz

customer_reviews.title: Small and tight!
customer_reviews.text: All around these shoes are tight! I don’t have a wide foot and couldn’t wear them even after I got 1 size up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100 years old
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty slim foot, so i was surprise to find that this shoes fit me so small in my normal size. Also the white rim that it has, is yellow, like if this shoes had 20 years Keep, looks old. Did not like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t fit right
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoe was too narrow for my foot and so I had to return them. But Steve Madden shoes don’t always fit me correctly, so that might just be my problem and not the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Arlred

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected. One word, UGLY!!
customer_reviews.text: Not what expected. Unattractive as well as poor fit which is unusual as all items I’ve purchased of Steve Madden label for the past decade have been satisfactory. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look super cute but they are by far one of the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever owned. I have given it plenty of chances but the backside just keeps cutting into the skin and mid-way through the day I end up regretting wearing it. Would absolutely not recommend them for more than 2 hours wear.
customer_reviews.author: NymphadoraTonks

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Omg, Had to send back 4 pairs. There were WAAAAAAAAAAAY, To SMALL. I wear a size 9. I returned for a 9 1/2, STILL WAY TO SMALL, felt life a size 7. So lastly the size 10 ( YIKES ) Arrived, I think they adorable, still a tiny bit tight in the toe , ZERO Arch Support !! My Back was killing Me. So, just Ehhh. But CUTE
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Get 1 size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and have gotten several compliments asking where I bought them. I gave 4 stars because I had to get a whole size larger than the the size I wear in 99% of other shoe brands. I wouldn't have known that had I not tried them on in store before purchasing. Also, size 8 (what I typically wear) and 8.5 were the exact same and had no difference in fit. Last, the color is more of a brownish gray to me, more brown, though.
customer_reviews.author: EMP

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is terrible I ordered a 9.5 and it was so tight now the recommendation on size is to order an 11. I think I’ll just get a refund I read other reviews and now afraid they will not be real.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and unwearable!!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic shoe and completely unfit for wear. Returned. Don't bother with this.
customer_reviews.author: KR Burton

customer_reviews.title: Torture on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Much too tight, I don't think they made the correct size. I wear a us size 11, but the exact size in this design was torture to fit my feet into.
customer_reviews.author: U o

customer_reviews.title: Not available in wides.
customer_reviews.text: Item is advertised as them come regular and wide width. This is not true. I bought a size up just in case it wasn’t wide width (to accomadate for it being too narrow) ended up being too big. Overly upset that it’s NOT WIDE WIDTH AND THERE IS BEING AN OPTION FOR IT BUT IT DOES NOT EXIST.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to clean and can wear them with pretty much anything
customer_reviews.text: These were tighter than my other pair which were the exact same size so that was a little frustrating but they still fit! It might be because of the material? Not sure, either way I wear them all the time and love them. The bottom is not white, it's more of an off white. They're easy to clean. I dress them up or down. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and style of these
customer_reviews.text: Just a tiny hair large, but fits in your size. (you could wear some thin socks and it would be perfect). I love the look and style of these, but having trouble breaking them in. ... they are a little stiff. not comfortable for wearing long periods of time. I hope the more I wear them the more comfortable they will get. Still recommend trying them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gerwick

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and look great with any outfit. They are not very comfortable though and they left really bad blisters on both of my heels. Definitely will keep trying to break them in though in hopes of being able to wear them without any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Rn410ac

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews about sizing. The biggest issue is that it says free returns, however it was anything but free. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: gatorhon

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and another very similar style of Steve Madden's. The others were a 10 and fit perfectly. These were an 11 and I couldn't even get them onto my feet.
customer_reviews.author: SB in Colo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have them in the khaki color and they lasted about two years before I completely walked through them. This lighter pale pink is more feminine and brings a little more flair to an outfit.
customer_reviews.author: seb75

customer_reviews.title: Beat Steve Madden shoes
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing pair of shoes. My only issue is I think I should have ordered a half size larger...but I also think they will stretch with time...so they are tts & I had toe room, it was just very snug
customer_reviews.author: Whitney White

customer_reviews.title: ... little stiff in the "tongue" area but they are good quality and true to size
customer_reviews.text: They are a little stiff in the "tongue" area but they are good quality and true to size. I saw some comments that showed a bad knockoff shoe, but I received the exact Steve Madden slip on. Very cute with any outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Blain

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 8 - 8.5 and I already owned these in black in a size 8.5 so, I bought these in white in a size 8.5. They were incredibly tight. After some significant stretching they finally fit OK as long as I'm not wearing socks or wearing a very thin sock. But, I recommend you go up either a half or whole size from your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, but runs very small. I ordered up a whole size and it’s still tight. It will take time to get them worn in a bit, as the material is not very flexible, but I do think they are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not as they seem.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "blush" color and expected a pink tint, as the photo looked but they are a very neutral tan color, no pink. I read a review about the grey color being not so grey and more neutral as well. I wanted to return but unfortunately I spaced on the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis N.

customer_reviews.title: I order a size 8 and they didn't fit they ...
customer_reviews.text: I order a size 8 and they didn't fit they felt so stiff too and I thought maybe they run small so i exchange and ordered a size 8 1/2 and they still didn't fit. I wen't to burlington and found the for 1/2 off in a size 8 tried them and they fit. Not sure why these are so hard and small.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I don't think these are authentic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I own another pair I'd purchased in person. These shoes look similar but were much narrower and fit different. I wore them out once and came back with blisters. My other pair fit perfectly. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: The shoes look great and seam similar to the original
customer_reviews.text: So I love these steve madden loafers for the summer and usually buy a size 8.5 from the store (tj maxx). This one was exceptionally hard to break into. I still don't think it's because the shoe is a fake, my reasoning was that the shoe is made of a stiffer material than the shoes I've previously owned. I finally broke into them by dunking them into water to loosen the fabric and now they fit like my older pairs. So i'd definitely buy a half-size up but they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Sanjana Gopalakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable shoe that I now own. I cant return them since now Ive worn them otherwise I would. Insole is plasticky which makes your feet sweaty. The back part of the shoe cut me within an hour. And the fabric rubs with every step on your toes which hurts. Not a happy camper, I so wanted to love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: This style of shoe is popular my girls love them, just not this brand
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, This style of shoe is popular my girls love them, just not this brand. One size was tooooo small and the next size up was toooo big, I don't get it. Toe box is hard as a rock and you will get blisters on your heels. That's pretty expensive blisters for around 60 bucks. These are going back going to get a softer pair we saw in the store and a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Psterneker

customer_reviews.title: These are my second pair of Steve Madden flat sneakers ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Steve Madden flat sneakers, same style and these are much smaller and have given me awful blisters. The first pair did not give me a problem at all I'm not sure why these were so much smaller and more uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Flar

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up and they are TIGHT. Like barely fit. They are however well made and very cute. Id suggest sizing up a full size
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true size 8 and had to go up to an 8.5. Very narrow as well. fits tighter than most shoes and any other Steve Madden slip ons that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they basically can go with any outfit but, they aren’t the most comfortable even after I already wore them a few times. It’s not something id recommend to anyone. They are just okay.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: The "grey" is more taupe like the picture and that makes me happy!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased these! SIZE: I am always a 9, I ordered a 9.5 and I'm glad I did. They fit like I would want a 9 to fit. COLOR: I bought the "grey" wanting them to be more taupe like the photo shown, and they are! They are not a true grey. They are very comfy and my brother in law commented about them as I was writing this review lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfiest shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: my favorite shoe! even though its pricer than off name brands, its so worth it! lasted me wearing them EVERYDAY for two whole years before a tear was even made!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Once I ordered the right size, I was very happy with this purchase. They are lightweight and comfortable!! I originally ordered a 10 and inserted my orthotics, and it was still to large. A nine fit perfectly, with a little bit of room, enough to wear a lowboy sock!!
customer_reviews.author: Overworked

customer_reviews.title: Gave me used, dirty, and broken shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 6.5W. I’m usually a 6 but for sneakers I prefer a little room so For sneakers I order a 6.5. Still a bit too tight than my usual so I got the W. When I got my order, it was super dirty on the bottom like it’s been used?? And then Steve Madden button is missing on the back of one of my shoes. I’ve never had this happen and I’m very upset. I was so looking forward to these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: There's usually a little break-in period but these shoes were so tight and gave me blisters that I had to change mid-day to some others. They look decent for the price, but the white trim looks dingy--like they'd been worn.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: They are well made and are adorable! I purchased the black quilted pair
customer_reviews.text: They are a little tight, I wish I would have ordered a half a size up, but they fit. Hopefully they'll stretch out a bit. They are well made and are adorable! I purchased the black quilted pair.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at first, and very tight to start
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 in every pair of shoes, and when I first got these they were extremely tight to the point they were hard to get on. After a few wears they have stretched and are now comfortable, they took several wears before they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I got a half size up and they fit pretty well. Great quality and beautiful shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Like walking with wooden shoes
customer_reviews.text: they're good, they look amazing but they're hard af. definitely not made to stay on them all day walking or standing.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes but man do they hurt.
customer_reviews.text: I saw these shoes and I had to have them they're very much my style and the price was right. But when I got them I was highly disappointed. Although they did fit their very tight and walking in them turn to be impossible. They rub the back of your heel so hard that you have a blister within minutes. After those few minutes I took them off and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews which said to order 1/2 bigger as they ran small, which I did but they were narrow as well. Wish they came in wide as I’d exchange them. Unfortunately I have to return them. Style and material are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: BrenBen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these for a while! I took the advice in the reviews and sized up. They are super comfortable and do not rub the back of my heel at all. I have when they every day since I received them. I want to get another color.
customer_reviews.author: Christy H

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again
customer_reviews.text: I doubt these are genuine Steve Madden, they feel very cheap and plastic and squeak when I walk. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: heather duncan

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! They look great. Just as I hoped from the picture. A little stiff but to be expected from a new shoe like this. I am thankful so many people said to order up a half size. I am always a 6. Got these in 6.5 and it’s a perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Graceathena

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are definitely knock-offs. I knew it from the second I opened the box as they seemed really different right off that bat. I have another pair that I've worn out which were purchased from Nordstrom; I remember how they fit when I had first bought them and these were so small that I couldn't even get my foot in a shoe that should have been the same size. They visually looked smaller and just felt different. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kristel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, wear these most days, wide toe box, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Button

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Ecentrcq Sneaker
product_meta.description: Show off your fierce attitude with ecentrcq, the perfect slip on sneaker with a quilted leather upper with rubber outsole. Offered in wide widths to hit more feet
feature_bullets: Quilted slip-on with dual goring and logo medallion at counter
Removable cushioned footbed. Man-made upper, sole, lining
Man-made upper / Man-made sole / Man-made lining
